about_the_game:
Welcome to Aquilon – a legendary city where the shadows of dungeons intertwine with the fury of gladiator battles and ruthless decisions. Here, the fates of slaves, desperate adventurers, ambitious aristocrats, the poor, and monster hunters looking to strike it rich are decided. In this brutal world, you're one of those willing to risk everything for a chance to change your destiny, where blood and desire are the ultimate currency.

You’ve always known how to profit from gladiator fights, especially when it comes to betting on the battles of seductive beauties. But luck turned against you — you lost everything, including the borrowed money from one of the city’s most powerful figures. Just when it seemed like you were out of options, fate handed you another chance: to become the owner and trainer at your uncle’s estate.

Now you train and supervise sexy gladiatrixes ready to fight for overall victory.. But within the walls of the estate, dark plots and hidden intrigues threaten not just your future but the lives of those under your care. Will you be able to overcome the challenges, reclaim what you’ve lost, and find your place again in a world where passion and danger walk hand in hand?

Gameplay & Mechanics

You’ll manage your estate, train your fighters, engage in battles, develop relationships, and seduce passionate warrior beauties

- Engaging Plot

- Resource Management

- Estate Upgrades

- Character Improvement

- Assigning Characters to Tasks
